CONCLUSION: Preliminary objection dismissed (Article 35-1 - Six month period);Remainder inadmissible;Violation of Article 11 - Freedom of assembly and association (Article 11-1 - Freedom of peaceful assembly);Non-pecuniary damage - award (Article 41 - Non-pecuniary damage;Just satisfaction)
JUDGES: Alvina Gyulumyan;Corneliu Bîrsan;Egbert Myjer;Elisabet Fura;Ineta Ziemele;Josep Casadevall
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE , GPE . He is the chairman of a regional branch of ORG ( « Հանրապետություն » կուսակցություն ) .

CARDINAL . NORP In DATE a presidential election was held in GPE with its first and second rounds taking place on DATE and DATE respectively . Following the first and second rounds , a series of protest rallies were organised in GPE by the opposition parties .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant participated in a demonstration held in GPE which was apparently followed by a march .
CARDINAL . On DATE , when another demonstration was apparently supposed to take place in GPE , the applicant and CARDINAL other members of his party set off by car from GPE to GPE .

CARDINAL . The applicant alleged that on the road to GPE their car was stopped by several individuals in civilian clothes who introduced themselves as officers of ORG . The applicant and his colleagues were taken to ORG . From there the applicant was transferred to ORG of GPE where an administrative case was initiated against him on account of his participation in the demonstration of DATE .

CARDINAL . On DATE , TIME , the applicant was taken to the GPE and ORG of GPE ( Երևան քաղաքի Կենտրոն և Նորք-Մարաշ համայնքներկ առաջին ատյանի դատարան ) . There he was brought before Judge PERSON who , having heard the applicant and his lawyer , after a brief hearing sentenced the applicant under LAW ( Վարչական իրավախախտումների վերաբերյալ ՀՀ օրենսգիրք – “ the CAO ” ) to DATE of administrative detention , finding that :
“ On DATE [ the applicant ] participated in an unauthorised march , thus violating the prescribed rules for organising and holding street marches and demonstrations .
For this act [ the applicant ] was brought to ORG on DATE .

The fact of [ the applicant ’s ] participation in an unauthorised march was confirmed by the explanation given by [ the applicant ] in court and the examination of the materials of the administrative case file . ”
CARDINAL . The decision stated that it was not subject to appeal and could be protested against only by the prosecutor .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant ’s lawyer lodged both an appeal with the Criminal and Military Court of Appeal ( ՀՀ քրեական և զինվորական գործերով վերաքննիչ դատարան ) and an application with ORG ( ՀՀ գլխավոր դատախազ ) requesting him to initiate an appeal against the decision of ORG . The lawyer argued at the outset , relying on various domestic provisions , that he was entitled to lodge an appeal against the decision of ORG . As to the merits , he submitted that the interference with the applicant ’s right to freedom of peaceful assembly was in violation of the LAW and was not prescribed by law , and the penalty imposed was excessive . The lawyer attached a copy of the contested decision to the appeal .
CARDINAL . On DATE the President of the Criminal and Military Court of Appeal ( ՀՀ քրեական և զինվորական գործերով վերաքննիչ դատարանի նախագահ ) reviewed the applicant ’s conviction , finding that :

“ [ The applicant , according to the decision of ORG , was subjected to administrative detention ] ... for violating the prescribed rules for organising and holding assemblies , demonstrations , street marches and rallies , by participating in an unauthorised demonstration and street march on DATE .
Having familiarised myself with [ the applicant ’s ] appeal and the materials concerning the administrative offence , I find that the penalty imposed on [ the applicant ] must be changed . ”

CARDINAL . The President changed the penalty to an administrative fine of QUANTITY ( ORG ) ( MONEY ( ORG ) at the material time ) and ordered the applicant ’s release . On the same date the applicant was released from detention , after he had served DATE of his sentence .

CARDINAL . By a letter of CARDINAL DATE the applicant ’s lawyer was informed by ORG ( ՀՀ գլխավոր դատախազություն ) that , on the basis of the applicant ’s appeal , the penalty had been changed and the applicant had been released by decision of ORG .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant supplemented his initial application , complaining about the following events .
CARDINAL . On DATE he participated in a demonstration held in GPE .

CARDINAL . On DATE he was taken to a police station and then transported to the GPE and ORG of GPE where an administrative fine of ORG CARDINAL,CARDINAL was imposed on him for having organised the participation of a group of people from his region in an unauthorised demonstration on DATE .
CARDINAL . For a summary of the relevant provisions concerning administrative proceedings see the judgment in the case of ORG v. GPE ( no . GPE , § DATE , DATE ) .

CARDINAL . For a summary of the relevant legislation invoked by the parties in connection with LAW ORG ( see paragraphs CARDINAL and CARDINAL below ) see the judgment in the case of Mkrtchyan v. GPE ( no . CARDINAL , § § CARDINAL , DATE ) .
